EventCb = ref object
  kind*: EventCbKind
  priority*: int
  glob*: string
  handler*: proc (thisNode: Node)
Source   Edit   
EventCbKind = enum
  OnClick, OnClickOutside, OnRightClick, OnAnyClick, OnFrame, OnEdit, OnDisplay,
  OnFocus, OnUnfocus, OnShow, OnHide, OnMouseMove, OnLoad, OnButtonPress,
  OnButtonRelease, OnResize
Source   Edit

  onUnfocusNode*: Node
